item.description:
Holiday Party, with at least 6 meetup groups and an Actors Repertory Theatre Group.

The meetups who are attending are Boston Nights, Tall Singles, a non meetup Actors Repertory Theatre group, 4 musician meetups and other groups. The venue has a relaxed atmosphere, and free live music with great musicians. PA's Lounge in Union Sq, 345 Washington St. Somerville, MA. Starts at 7.30PM.

Party goers, Dancers, Singles, Musicians, & Singers - Come join the party! Bring your friends for the party, network, and meet interesting people, actors, musicians & singles. Everyone Welcome. Music by Brock and Roll Revival and other featured musicians, singers and singer songwriters. Originals, covers, blues, jazz, classic rock, R&B, Motown, folk, etc. Back up band with drums, bass, guitar, and Songlist for singers.
item.name: Holiday Party, with 7 groups
